name: The Front Door Package Demo
description:
This is a Demo Version of the Game the Full Version Will Be On (Steam) 

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

(SUMMARY )

While on Your Way to Bed After a Long Day of Work

At 1 AM in You Receive a Package at Your Door Step

And The Night Unravels From There And Your Slow Decent

into Madness Begins 

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

(LONG DESCRIPTION )

"Front Door Package " is a First - Person Psychological Horror Thriller.

The Game Takes Place After You Receive the Package Stumbling Through Scary

Dimensions Looking for a Way Home

(((Average time to Complete the Demo is : 90 minutes)))

In The Front Door Package The Main Character Has a Slow Decent Into

Madness-Solving Puzzle's,  Traveling Through Dimensions,

Finding Weapons, Fighting Enemies and Fighting for Your Life

After Receiving the Package 

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

LIST

- Genre: "Walking Horror Simulator"

- You Will Walk From One Room to Another Noticing Small Changes

- Exploring Horrifying Dimensions Solving Weird Puzzle's to Find Your Way Home

- Stay ALERT TO All Possible Threats Of Danger 

- an Immersive Horror Experience 

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
